quest.name: How Do You Like Three Nuts
journal: Halldor seems positively giddy to see you again.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Hey there, killer. Getting bored of those two-nut marks, I'll wager?

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Aye, they might've been enough to get the blood pumping and the heart racing before, but it's only a matter of time before the excitement fades.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: I know exactly how you feel, my friend! I myself can think of nothing more exciting than being driven to my mortal limits. To be forced to bring fang and claw to bear when weapons shatter and you're scrambling to survive with whatever is at hand!

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Who are we to deny you that singular sport, aye!? That's why I've recommended you for three-nut marks! Be proud! Soon you'll be dancing with death herself!

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: Go and speak with Xylle. I'm sure she'll be absolutely thrilled to grant you this wonderful privilege!

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: So you wish to hunt three-nut marks, do you? I thought as much when I saw you approach. Also, Halldor has been clamoring day and night for you to be granted permission, so there was that too.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: Whenever the subject of you and your exploits comes up, he is filled with a fiery passion. It is as though he lives vicariously through your tales... In any event, if you desire greater challenges, then you may have them.

dialogue.name: XYLLE
dialogue.text: Do be mindful of the increased risks in pursuing these marks. You are of no use to us dead or horribly maimed.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Three-nut Clan mark bills are now available.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are now permitted to take bills for three-nut marks from the Clan Hunt board.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New quests and elite Clan mark bills will become available from Halldor in the Crystarium upon reaching level 80.

dialogue.name: HALLDOR
dialogue.text: What are you waiting for!? The promise of death-defying adventure awaits! Go and see Xylle at once!
